comments.en:
Japanese version of the Epson Stylus Photo 2100/2200.

7-ink (CcMmYKk, has light black ink) 13x19/A3-large-format high-end photo printer with roll feeder, automatic paper cutter, full bleed (borderless) printing, prints also directly on CDs.

96 nozzles per color.

USB2, Parallel, and FireWire (IEEE 1394).

Supported in Gimp-Print 4.2.2rc2, 4.3.4, or newer.

Consumables/Refills: 7 separate ink tanks: Cyan, light cyan, magenta, light magenta, yellow, black (photo or matte black), light black
